dmca.title: Possible lawsuit
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

 

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

 

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

 

Please visit our web site at www.ev1servers.net/About/dmca.aspx

 

Legal Response Team

 
 
-----Original Message-----
From: Babylon [mailto:freddieseo@babylongirls.co.uk] 
Sent: Tuesday, November 28, 2006 1:52 PM
To: EV1 Abuse; EV1 Abuse; EV1 Abuse
Cc: HOU-notify; EV1 Abuse
Subject: Possible lawsuit
Importance: High


Hello
I represent Babylon girls web site and it has come to our attention that
most of the girl's pictures being used on the following web site belong
to us.
http://vipsecretsny.com/models.htm 

From our research we can see that the above web site is hosted through
ev1servers.net.
 
I am instructing your client to remove all images taken from Babylon
girls immediately, or we will be forced to take the appropiate legal
action.
We are simply going through you as we are unable to find an email for
this company, this follows a telephone call made to the company last
week.
 
 
Kind regards
Frederick Johnson
Babylon girls
